name: Home (itch) (GoofyPomPom)
description:
Shortcuts: 

Q = convert all resources into credits (1 credit = 5 log, 3 water, 2 hay)

Left Shift: open & close shop window

Esc = Pause (Main menu / Retry)

E = chop trees

R = Take hays

F = Take water

Movement:

- WASD = Forward, Backward, Left, Right

- Space = Jump

- Left click another planet to move to that planet

Refill Durations:

Well = 8s

Tree = 16s

Hay = 7s

Mission:

Get as much credit as you can and upgrade your entire house in the shop(shift) menu as fast as possible!

Bugs Warning:

Spawning trees and hay infinitely. good luck. I give up

Credits:

By: GoofyPomPom & iToaster

All SFX/Musics are from freesound.org
